subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa got off to a solid start in a bid for her fourth consecutive victory and fifth in six starts this year. Playing for the fourth straight week, Ochoa shot a four-under 68 in the first round of the Ginn Open in Reunion, Fla., to finish a stroke behind the leaders, Carin Koch and Teresa Lu.
